Negative_Review: Virtually zero air con Would NEVER stay here again to be honest because of this For a huge global organisation such as Accor to not invest in proper air con is a joke Called to mention this to the reception and they agreed the air con also was bad in the place i would actually remove air con from the hotel there isn t The shower was the most ridiculous we ve ever used Turned it on and it sprays over the top of the glass all over your personal belongings TV didn t work Called staff to mention about the air con they said they d would be up to us in 5 but forgot about us and I had to call them back Terrible
Positive_Review: It was hard to like or get comfortable in the room as it was so small Otherwise the location and quietness was pretty good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Room was nice and clean amazing comfortable bed Tea and coffee facilities in the room Lovely champayne at the bar and the complimentary nuts was a nice touch Friendly staff happy to speak English with us and help out and perfect location for us to walk around and close to metro

Negative_Review: It was not that clean cobwebs on the ceiling dusty brown marks moth and mold in the shower
Positive_Review: Got upgraded to privelege room Nice location comfy bed and really nice pillows Gift birchbox Friendly staff

Negative_Review: The rooms was too small and overall it is not a four star hotel Bathrooms was very small water was leaking from the tap and from the bath cabin
Positive_Review: The breakfast was ok fresh bread and croissant The location of the hotel is ok close to metro and 5 10 min waking distance from Act de Triumph

Negative_Review: The smallest possible room that can just fit a double bed All rooms are smallish in Paris but this one beats all records Bathroom tiny no usuable shelves only a working overhead shower Address Champs Elysee is misleading on account of the hotel s location

Negative_Review: Room insulation very poor and nobody answered the phone at the reception during the night The room nearby ours was doing a party until 4 30 am and nobody did anything if you like to sleep please do not go there

Positive_Review: The location was very good near to arc the thriomphe with subway bus supermarket bakery etc At the same time the bed was also very comfortable Good place to stay extremly recommended

Negative_Review: It was almost impossible to enter the shower as it was tiny and there is a glass door that limits your entrance
Positive_Review: The room was cosy clean and in the center of the city A few minutes away from the Champs Elyse and many train stations The staff was super friendly and very helpful

Negative_Review: At night there was no one manning the front desk and the electric door of the hotel was open to anyone to walk in It should only open when you swipe a hotel key for example For added security 5th floor has stairs to get to it as elevator only goes to 4th Had to carry my bag up stairs with 2 slipper discs and wasn t told ahead of time At night as a woman alone I felt there could be additional security at the hotel doors and reception to restrict who can come in as no one around to ask for help in case it is needed A tight squeeze to get into the shower If you are big or pregnant As a small framed person i had to put my back against the tiles to get in as it only swings inwards due to tight space
Positive_Review: Comfy bed and pillows Good location Cosy

Negative_Review: The carpet was dirty pieces of plastic wood etc was on the floor Very noticeable that the room was not hoovered Same applies to the bathroom we found a toe nail next to the toilet on the floor A feeling that the towels and the bedsheets were not changed
Positive_Review: Close to touristy locations The mattrase was comfortable We could live our suitacases and pick them up before out flight

Negative_Review: Shower leaked Walls are thin could hear the couple next door as if they were in my room

Negative_Review: When tap water poured into the kettle lots of bubbles came out from the kettle Even though I have rinsed inside the kettle many times bubbles were still remained when tap water poured in No complimentary water bottle provided in my room but my colleague in another room who has it
